channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:30 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 09:30 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further updates. #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
